subSubSection.paragraph:

General distribution. Central ASia ( UzbekiStan , KyrgyzStan , * TurkmeniStan , * TajikiStan ), Europe (north to 66°), RuSSia (eaSt to Far EaSt), North Africa, Turkey , Near EaSt, Mongolia , Japan .
Remark. Rare in Central ASia, recorded in the mountainS only.
